Package: com.android.builder.core

[Java] Class AndroidBuilder

    • com.android.builder.core.AndroidBuilder

    • This is the main builder class. It is given all the data to process the build (such as DefaultProductFlavors, DefaultBuildType and dependencies) and use them when doing specific build steps. To use: create a builder with AndroidBuilder(String, String, ILogger, boolean) then build steps can be done with mergeManifests(java.io.File, java.util.List, java.util.List, String, int, String, String, String, Integer, String, com.android.manifmerger.ManifestMerger2.MergeType, java.util.Map) processTestManifest(String, String, String, String, String, Boolean, Boolean, java.io.File, java.util.List, java.io.File, java.io.File) processResources(java.io.File, java.io.File, java.io.File, java.util.List, String, String, String, String, String, com.android.builder.core.VariantConfiguration.Type, boolean, com.android.builder.model.AaptOptions, java.util.Collection, boolean, java.util.Collection) compileAllAidlFiles(java.util.List, java.io.File, java.io.File, java.util.List, com.android.builder.compiling.DependencyFileProcessor) convertByteCode(Iterable, Iterable, java.io.File, boolean, java.io.File, DexOptions, java.util.List, java.io.File, boolean) packageApk(String, java.io.File, java.util.Collection, java.util.Collection, String, java.util.Collection, java.util.Set, boolean, com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig, com.android.builder.model.PackagingOptions, String) Java compilation is not handled but the builder provides the bootclasspath with getBootClasspath().

      • Constructor Detail

        • public AndroidBuilder(@com.android.annotations.NonNull String projectId, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String createdBy, @com.android.annotations.NonNull com.android.utils.ILogger logger, boolean verboseExec)

          Creates an AndroidBuilder.

          verboseExec is needed on top of the ILogger due to remote exec tools not being able to output info and verbose messages separately.

          Parameters:
          createdBy - the createdBy String for the apk manifest.
          logger - the Logger
          verboseExec - whether external tools are launched in verbose mode

      • Method Detail

        • public void compileAidlFile(@com.android.annotations.NonNull File sourceFolder, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File aidlFile, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File sourceOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File parcelableOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> importFolders, @com.android.annotations.Nullable DependencyFileProcessor dependencyFileProcessor)

          Compiles the given aidl file.

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:
          aidlFile - the AIDL file to compile
          sourceOutputDir - the output dir in which to generate the source code
          importFolders - all the import folders, including the source folders.
          dependencyFileProcessor - the dependencyFileProcessor to record the dependencies of the compilation.

        • public void compileAllAidlFiles(@com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> sourceFolders, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File sourceOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File parcelableOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> importFolders, @com.android.annotations.Nullable DependencyFileProcessor dependencyFileProcessor)

          Compiles all the aidl files found in the given source folders.

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:
          sourceFolders - all the source folders to find files to compile
          sourceOutputDir - the output dir in which to generate the source code
          importFolders - import folders
          dependencyFileProcessor - the dependencyFileProcessor to record the dependencies of the compilation.

        • public void compileAllRenderscriptFiles(@com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> sourceFolders, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> importFolders, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File sourceOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File resOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File objOutputDir, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File libOutputDir, int targetApi, boolean debugBuild, int optimLevel, boolean ndkMode, boolean supportMode, @com.android.annotations.Nullable Set<String> abiFilters)

          Compiles all the renderscript files found in the given source folders. Right now this is the only way to compile them as the renderscript compiler requires all renderscript files to be passed for all compilation. Therefore whenever a renderscript file or header changes, all must be recompiled.

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:
          sourceFolders - all the source folders to find files to compile
          importFolders - all the import folders.
          sourceOutputDir - the output dir in which to generate the source code
          resOutputDir - the output dir in which to generate the bitcode file
          targetApi - the target api
          debugBuild - whether the build is debug
          optimLevel - the optimization level
          ndkMode
          supportMode - support mode flag to generate .so files.
          abiFilters - ABI filters in case of support mode

        • public void convertByteCode(@com.android.annotations.NonNull Collection<File> inputs, @com.android.annotations.NonNull Collection<File> preDexedLibraries, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File outDexFolder, boolean multidex, boolean multidexLegacy, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File mainDexList, @com.android.annotations.NonNull DexOptions dexOptions, @com.android.annotations.Nullable List<String> additionalParameters, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File tmpFolder, boolean incremental, boolean optimize)

          Converts the bytecode to Dalvik format

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:
          inputs - the input files
          preDexedLibraries - the list of pre-dexed libraries
          outDexFolder - the location of the output folder
          dexOptions - dex options
          additionalParameters - list of additional parameters to give to dx
          incremental - true if it should attempt incremental dex if applicable

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<File> getCompileClasspath(@com.android.annotations.NonNull VariantConfiguration<?, ?, ?> variantConfiguration)

          Returns the compile classpath for this config. If the config tests a library, this will include the classpath of the tested config. If the SDK was loaded, this may include the renderscript support jar.

          Returns:
          a non null, but possibly empty set.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public File getDxJar()

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public List<File> getLeafFolders(@com.android.annotations.NonNull String extension, List<File>... importFolders)

          Computes and returns the leaf folders based on a given file extension. This looks through all the given root import folders, and recursively search for leaf folders containing files matching the given extensions. All the leaf folders are gathered and returned in the list.

          Parameters:
          extension - the extension to search for.
          importFolders - an array of list of root folders.
          Returns:
          a list of leaf folder, never null.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public com.android.utils.ILogger getLogger()

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<File> getPackagedJars(@com.android.annotations.NonNull VariantConfiguration<?, ?, ?> variantConfiguration)

          Returns the list of packaged jars for this config. If the config tests a library, this will include the jars of the tested config If the SDK was loaded, this may include the renderscript support jar.

          Returns:
          a non null, but possibly empty list.

          the jar file, or null.

        • public void mergeManifests(@com.android.annotations.NonNull File mainManifest, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<File> manifestOverlays, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<? extends ManifestDependency> libraries, String packageOverride, int versionCode, String versionName, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String minSdkVersion, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String targetSdkVersion, @com.android.annotations.Nullable Integer maxSdkVersion, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String outManifestLocation, com.android.manifmerger.ManifestMerger2$MergeType mergeType, Map<String, String> placeHolders, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File reportFile)

          Invoke the Manifest Merger version 2.

        • public void packageApk(@com.android.annotations.NonNull String androidResPkgLocation, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File dexFolder, @com.android.annotations.NonNull Collection<File> dexedLibraries, @com.android.annotations.NonNull Collection<File> packagedJars, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String javaResourcesLocation, @com.android.annotations.Nullable Collection<File> jniLibsFolders, @com.android.annotations.Nullable Set<String> abiFilters, boolean jniDebugBuild, @com.android.annotations.Nullable com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig signingConfig, @com.android.annotations.Nullable com.android.builder.model.PackagingOptions packagingOptions, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String outApkLocation)

          Packages the apk.

          throws:
          DuplicateFileException
          throws:
          FileNotFoundException if the store location was not found
          throws:
          KeytoolException
          throws:
          PackagerException
          throws:
          SigningException when the key cannot be read from the keystore
          Parameters:
          androidResPkgLocation - the location of the packaged resource file
          dexFolder - the folder with the dex file.
          dexedLibraries - optional collection of additional dex files to put in the apk.
          packagedJars - the jars that are packaged (libraries + jar dependencies)
          javaResourcesLocation - the processed Java resource folder
          jniLibsFolders - the folders containing jni shared libraries
          abiFilters - optional ABI filter
          jniDebugBuild - whether the app should include jni debug data
          signingConfig - the signing configuration
          packagingOptions - the packaging options
          outApkLocation - location of the APK.
          See Also:
          VariantConfiguration.getPackagedJars

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:
          inputFile - the input file
          outFile - the output file or folder if multi-dex is enabled.
          multiDex - whether multidex is enabled.
          dexOptions - dex options

          dexOptions - the dex options

          commandLineRunner - the command line runner

          the list of generated files.

          throws:
          InterruptedException
          throws:
          LoggedErrorException
          Parameters:

        • public void processTestManifest(@com.android.annotations.NonNull String testApplicationId, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String minSdkVersion, @com.android.annotations.Nullable String targetSdkVersion, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String testedApplicationId, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String instrumentationRunner, @com.android.annotations.NonNull Boolean handleProfiling, @com.android.annotations.NonNull Boolean functionalTest, @com.android.annotations.Nullable File testManifestFile, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<? extends ManifestDependency> libraries, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File outManifest, @com.android.annotations.NonNull File tmpDir)

          Creates the manifest for a test variant

          Parameters:
          testApplicationId - the application id of the test application
          minSdkVersion - the minSdkVersion of the test application
          targetSdkVersion - the targetSdkVersion of the test application
          testedApplicationId - the application id of the tested application
          instrumentationRunner - the name of the instrumentation runner
          handleProfiling - whether or not the Instrumentation object will turn profiling on and off
          functionalTest - whether or not the Instrumentation class should run as a functional test
          testManifestFile - optionally user provided AndroidManifest.xml for testing application
          libraries - the library dependency graph
          outManifest - the output location for the merged manifest

          VariantConfiguration.getInstrumentationRunner

        • public void setTargetInfo(@com.android.annotations.NonNull SdkInfo sdkInfo, @com.android.annotations.NonNull TargetInfo targetInfo)

          Sets the SdkInfo and the targetInfo on the builder. This is required to actually build (some of the steps).

          Parameters:
          sdkInfo - the SdkInfo
          targetInfo - the TargetInfo
          See Also:
          SdkLoader

        • public void signApk(File in, com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig signingConfig, File out)

          Signs a single jar file using the passed com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig.

          throws:
          IOException
          throws:
          KeytoolException
          throws:
          SigningException
          throws:
          NoSuchAlgorithmException
          throws:
          SignedJarBuilder.IZipEntryFilter.ZipAbortException
          throws:
          com.android.builder.signing.SigningException
          Parameters:
          in - the jar file to sign.
          signingConfig - the signing configuration
          out - the file path for the signed jar.
